Header: Kilinochchi Troops Listen to Lecture on Children's Day
Content: Under the guidance of Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces Kilinochchi, troops organized an awareness lecture on the topic 'Sumithuru Deyakin-Dinawamu Daruwan' with the coordination of the Directorate of Psychological Operations on Tuesday (1) at the Nelumpiyasa auditorium on account of the World's Children Day. Lieutenant Colonel B.G.S Samanthi of the Directorate of Psychological operations conducted the awareness lecture. 35 Officers and 650 Other Ranks serving the SFHQ-KLN participated in the awareness programme.
